snippet.title: Makato: Your Fantasy Shop - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Makato: Your Fantasy Shop

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2312430/Makato_Your_Fantasy_Shop/

Manage your own shop in a medieval fantasy world called Makato. Build the shop of your dreams. Build displays to sell goods and earn money to expand your shop. Specialize on a special category of goods like equipment for warriors or sell a wide variety of goods like weapons, armors, potions, and more. Get to know the locals, complete their special requests , hire them as crafstmen, and forge a relationship with them.
